programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep106
programme.desc: Dandelions - The twins inadvertently ruin Fifi's garden while playing a game. Can they and the other tots make it better before Fifi finds out?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep107
programme.desc: Come And Play Slugsy - Stingo has dispatched Slugsy to steal Fifi's jelly. Slugsy starts to play with the twins and forgets what he set out to do, much to Stingo's wrath!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep108
programme.desc: Bumble's Magic - Bumble is practicing for his magic show but he has made the twins disappear! Can Fifi help him find them before the big show?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep109
programme.desc: Naughty Twins - Stingo is frustrated that he is always getting caught trying to take food from the other tots. He persuades the twins to go round the garden for him collecting food will the other tots realise what he is up to?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep41
programme.desc: What's Happened To My Little Tree? - Jess shows us his little tree: a beautiful flowering shrub in full bloom. He tells us that his little tree didn't always look like this...there was a time when the tree's leaves turned yellow! What's happening to my little tree? That's the Big Question! Jess asks Mimi for help, but she's in bed with a bad cold. She's drinking lots of fluids to help make her better. Jess gives his little tree some more water to help make it better but when he goes to check on his tree the next day the leaves have turned brown and crinkly! Baa and Billie come along - Billie is tucked in the brim of Baa's woolly hat, it's too cold for her to come out. Jess wonders if his little tree is cold and needs warming up. So he wraps a potato sack round the little tree. But the next day things are even worse the leaves are falling off.! And it's happening all over Greendale Farm! Jess goes to see Horace who is busy composing a new song. It's all about the Seasons. Jess finally realises that what's happening to his tree is perfe

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep42
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Cool? - It's the day of Mimi's dance in Jess's barn but its too hot to move, let alone dance. Jess wonders how they can all keep cool! That's the BIG QUESTION. Jess asks his friends for ideas. Horace keeps cool by swimming under water, but that's no good for Jess and everyone else who can't swim. The puppies keep cool by panting, but that just makes Jess even hotter and out of breath. And Willow keeps cool by standing very still. That won't work for a dance, they can't all keep still! Mimi comes past holding a little fan which makes a lovely cool breeze. Jess realises that what they need is a giant fan that could make a cool breeze in the barn. He and Mimi make a huge fan which Horace works as part of his one-man band. Everyone has a great time dancing and keeping cool. Jess has answered the Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep43
programme.desc: What's The Funny Little Creature In The Pond? - Jess is looking after Horace's underwater friends in the pond whilst Horace is away. He sees a funny creature with a round head, a long tail and a little mark on his nose. What's the funny little creature in the pond? Hey! That's the Big Question! The creature has vanished so Jess describes it to Mimi who draws a picture of it. Mimi, Joey and Jinx think it must be a fish and name him Freddie, but Jess is not so sure. Time passes and Jess doesn't see Freddie again for ages. When he does spot him he's grown two back legs! Jess decides he needs a closer look using Billie's magnifying glass. They search for Freddie all round the pond. Baa thinks he's found him, but it turns out to be a newt, with four legs and spots on its back. At that moment a small frog jumps out onto a lily pad. It has the white mark on its nose just like Freddie but this is a frog! What's happened wonders Jess. Horace comes back and explains that frogs start out as tadpoles and gradually change, growing legs and losing their tail.

programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Pirate Party / Dr. Abuela - When Pepito magically gifts Escarlata legs, she finally gets the chance to crash her first Larimar party! // When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile - The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Hairy / Pups Save a Flying Kitty - Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep148
programme.desc: An Endless Story - Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pups Save an Adventure / Pups Save a Surprise - While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety! // It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty. But the pups are in for a surprise - PAW Patrol Appreciation Day!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Tinsel Badge - It's nearly Christmas, so while Duggee wraps presents to go under the tree he asks the Squirrels if they want to decorate the clubhouse.

programme.desc: The Hide And Seek Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels decide to play Hide and Seek. They've hidden in really good places, but Duggee finds everyone except Roly... Where could he be?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: UFC 292: Sterling vs O'Malley
programme.desc: Main Event - Fresh from a major victory over Henry Cejudo, Aljamain Sterling puts his UFC bantamweight title on the line on August 19 against Sugar Sean OMalley in a quest to not just keep his crown but cement his place as the best bantamweight to ever wear UFC gold. In the co-main event of UFC 292, which takes place at TD Garden in Boston, Chinese star Zhang Weili defends her UFC strawweight championship against Brazilian battler Amanda Lemo

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep9
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep27
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep10
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month Heavyweights - UFC Ultimate Knockouts celebrates Black History Month with a collection of the most powerful knockouts coming from the heavyweight division. See Francis Ngannou, Derrick Lewis, Curtis Blaydes, Walt Harris, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep907MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: The first champion from Mexico, Brandon Moreno, continues his rivalry with former flyweight champion Deiveson Figueiredo as they meet for a third time for the 125-pound belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their battle at UFC 270.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Gane vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Accor, Arena in Paris, France on Saturday, September 2, and its bringing the nations biggest star, former interim heavyweight champion Ciryl Gane, to headline once again in the UFC Fight Night main event against surging Moldovan contender Serghei Spivac. On a quest to return to the top of the division, Gane scored a blistering third-round knockout of Tai Tuivasa in his hometown in the UFCs first visit to France in 2022, and hes looking for a repeat against Spivac, who enters this bout on a three-fight winning streak, most recently finishing Derrick Lewis in a single round

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Gane vs. Spivac

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Gane vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Accor, Arena in Paris, France on Saturday, September 2, and its bringing the nations biggest star, former interim heavyweight champion Ciryl Gane, to headline once again in the UFC Fight Night main event against surging Moldovan contender Serghei Spivac. On a quest to return to the top of the division, Gane scored a blistering third-round knockout of Tai Tuivasa in his hometown in the UFCs first visit to France in 2022, and hes looking for a repeat against Spivac, who enters this bout on a three-fight winning streak, most recently finishing Derrick Lewis in a single round

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Gane vs. Spivac

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep11
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep29
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.
